skills.name: Starfall, Mooncry
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Arbor Apotheosis
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Acchata: Forming Winds
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Cleansing Sweep
skills.desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Weaving Roots
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Acchata: Roaring Thunder
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Kalpa Descend
skills.desc: Locks on a target and causes Destruction Lotus to Bloom. At the same time, dispels Destruction Lotus' Weakness Protected effect. Destruction Lotus's will use Havoc during its next action.

skills.name: Furor
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

skills.name: Weaving Roots
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Kalpa Descend
skills.desc: Locks on a target and causes Destruction Lotus to Bloom. At the same time, dispels Destruction Lotus' Weakness Protected effect. Destruction Lotus's will use Havoc during its next action.
